column1: January 26 is a day that has different meanings for different people . The date commemorates the establishment of the New World Order, which was later rechristened as "The Global Economic System (GES)," a term coined by The Economist magazine. The Economist coined this term in 1979. It's important to note, however, that while many believe the date symbolizes some form of impending global governance or a world government, it has no official or legal meaning or legal meaning. There is not even a specific day or year. The day itself is meaningless to most people because of how it's used.

column1: Are Men the New Minority ? According to this graph of Canadian medical school enrollment

column1: PASADENA , Calif. – Astronomers have spotted a swirling debris cloud around a sun-like star where terrestrial planets similar to Earth could exist -- and they think it could be a harbinger of a possible Earth twin. column1: As the teacher strike entered its second day Tuesday , public school teachers again took the streets of Chicago . . . On Monday night, about 200 teachers walked out of their classrooms in the South Side district, according to the Chicago Tribune. On Tuesday morning, hundreds more joined them in protesting the school system's plans to fire about 140 teachers and cut another 100 jobs over the next two years in an effort to balance the district's budget . . . Teachers called the proposed layoffs the "gigantic attack on the education of Chicago's children."

The world 's a mess . How do thoughtful people make sense of it all ? In this series we're asking that very question and trying to find some meaning and hope in this chaotic world. It's an old question, "Why is the world a mess?" And the answers are all around us, but it's hard to know what to make of all that, to find meaning, and to feel hope. What should we do or not do? column1: If you refinanced your home last year and remodeled , too , you might be entitled to an often-overlooked tax break. That's because refinancing your property is often considered a "home-sale" that also qualifies for a home-equity loan (HELOC) interest deduction. If you can deduct a portion of the HELOC interest, the amount of the deduction should be higher than the standard deduction. One of the most important things to watch for as an investor is when there is a market or economic bubble forming. These are usually periods where the market is perceived to be going in one direction and investors become extremely cautious in their investments. They become afraid that the market will go in the wrong direction when in actuality that may be not the case. This is a very real fear of people. c. 2012 Religion News Service ( RNS ) Most Americans who know that Mitt Romney is Mormon say the presumptive Republican nominee is not very religious. But less than half of those surveyed think Romney has a strong faith. The survey by Pew Research Center, released Monday, found that 61 percent of respondents say they know Romney is Mormon, and only 38 percent say he is a religious person. About one-third of respondents say Romney is "not very religious." The survey also found that Romney is a distant third to Rick Perry for having the strongest faith and to Michele Bachmann for having the most spiritual beliefs.

The bride was the only one not to be covered by a veil, and her face was covered by a scarf. column1: Chronic constrictive pericarditis ( CP ) is a relatively rare condition in which the pericardium becomes fibrotic and noncompliant

column3: depending on the severity of symptoms
column4: and they tend to occur around the time of physical activity. Chronic CP has a good prognosis
column5: with a median survival of more than 20 years
column6: although it does have an increased risk of mortality. CP is often treated with conservative treatments.

column1: A hangnail is a small piece of jagged or torn skin that appears at the very edge of the fingernail. The term "hangnail" generally refers to the area where the nail was born. The nail itself is generally not affected. But if the jagged piece of skin remains, it can become an infection-prone sore that will cause pain, redness, swelling, and bleeding. The nail may be infected with bacteria that lead to the formation of pus-filled lesions. Some types of hangnails are caused by fungus. Other types of hangnails come from bacteria that enter the skin during healing.

The judge said the NRC "failed to maintain the highest level of competence, independence and accountability in carrying out its duties under the Atomic Energy Act."
